title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AI driven application modernization at scale (MAM103)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 大规模AI驱动的应用现代化 (MAM103)
abstract: Learn how to transform complex legacy workloads—like Java, ERP, and mainframe systems—into agile, cloud-ready applications using Pega Blueprint and GenAI. This session explores how to overcome modernization challenges such as technical debt, integration risks, and workflow transformation. Discover how AI-powered design agents and model-driven architectures accelerate transformation while preserving business continuity and data integrity. Whether you are tackling contact center, field services, or core banking modernization, this session equips you with practical strategies to reimagine legacy systems and unlock enterprise agility. This presentation is brought to you by Pega, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 学习如何使用Pega Blueprint和GenAI将复杂的遗留工作负载（如Java、ERP和大型机系统）转换为敏捷的云就绪应用程序。本次会议探讨如何克服现代化挑战，如技术债务、集成风险和工作流转换。了解AI驱动的设计代理和模型驱动架构如何在保持业务连续性和数据完整性的同时加速转换。无论您是在处理联络中心、现场服务还是核心银行现代化，本次会议都为您提供重新构想遗留系统和释放企业敏捷性的实用策略。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Pega为您呈现。
